item.title: ZaReason Terra HD
item.description: The Terra HD is a thin and lightweight 11.6-inch netbook/subnotebook by Linux hardware builder ZaReason. It is powered by a 1.66 GHz Intel Atom N450 CPU.

item.title: ZaReason Teo
item.description: The ZaReason Teo, that I just discovered on Amazon.com, looks like the successor of the Terra A20, which was the first netbook by ZaReason.

item.title: ZaReason Terra A20
item.description: The Terra A20 is the first netbook by ZaReason, a Linux hardware builder based in Berkeley, California. The Terra A20 has a 10 inch matte LCD screen.
